New Records: Sri Lanka achieved the highest chase in Asia Cup history to win the match by 2 wickets
Key Match Events: Kusal Mendis was out for 29 runs
Dasun Shanaka was out for 39 runs
Chamika Karunaratne was out for 16 runs
Wanindu Hasaranga was out for 2 runs
Asitha Fernando hit 4 fours in the last 4 balls to win the match
Pre-Game Insights: Shakib Al Hasan said they wanted to field first, but that's not in their control
Dasun Shanaka said they are going to bowl first, it's a used wicket, so chasing will be important
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka won the match by 2 wickets and qualified for the Super 4
Dasun Shanaka said it was a great performance by the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mosaddek Hossain scored 38 runs for Bangladesh
Mehidy Hasan Miraz scored 20 runs for Bangladesh
Mustafizur Rahman took 1 wicket for Bangladesh
The match was a close finish with Sri Lanka needing 26 runs off 13 balls
Others: The match was played on September 1, 2022
The match was played at the Asia Cup 2022
